name: jojoshooter
description:
You can only shoot the purple minion.

You loose some life point if touched by arrows or minions.

Only your shield can destroy the arrows.

If your shield touches the plane, the plane won't be able to shoot for few seconds.

If your tank touches a greed flash, you will be able to shoot faster for few seconds.

If your tank touches a red flask, your will shoot at a slow speed.

Move your tank with your mouse... your tank will follow the cursor.

Tank shoot = left mouse  click

Tank shield = right mouse click

Good luck
